ygData.subject: Re: Bard Express Mail Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: I bugged this.  He wants mail delivered to freeport, but no matter how I tried he wouldn t give me a letter.  Now the bard just inside the entrance of Feerot
ygData.messageBody:
I bugged this. He wants mail delivered to freeport, but no matter how I tried he wouldn't give me a letter. Now the bard just inside the entrance of Feerot did.

Roop
-----Original Message-----
From: Glen Colby <voidchld@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 05, 1999 2:19 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Express Mail Spoiler


There is also a Bard npc in Innothule named something darksinger... I was playing my ogre shaman but couldnt get close enough to talk to him with out killing me
Talonstar, Wandering minsteral of E'ci
Shadowmoon, Assassin
Boss, ogre Shaman
